front.title: •4-LOM's Concussion Rifle
front.gametext: Use 4 Force to deploy on your warrior, free on 4-LOM. May target a character or creature for free at same site or exterior site up to 2 sites away. Draw destiny. Add 1 if Blaster Scope attached. If total destiny - distance to target > defense value, target hit.
front.lore: BlasTech LJ-90. Not as accurate as the E-11 Blaster Rifle, but uses the same scope mount and has much better range. Acquired by 4-LOM after teaming up with Zuckuss.
